channel.title: How do i make npc's walk
channel.description:
ow would i make npc's walk I went to autospawn.cfg now what
looks like:
[size=8pt][size=10pt]spawn = 2313 3227 2397 0 0 0 0 0 1[/size][/size]

item.title: How do i make npc's walk
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

i tried this:[size=8pt]spawn = 13 3114 3170 0 3119 3249 3109 3239 1 [/size] but didnt work[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:357670”]Alright, well the NPC’s X coord is 2313, and the Y coord is 3227, and say we want it to be able to walk 5 spaces in any direction.
Max_X = 2313 + 5 = 2318
Max_Y = 3227 + 5 = 3232
Min_X = 2313 - 5 = 2308
Min_Y = 3227 - 5 = 3222

So we would have:
spawn = 2313 3227 2397 0 2318 3232 2308 3222 1[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's walk

item.title: How do i make npc's walk
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Alright, well the NPC’s X coord is 2313, and the Y coord is 3227, and say we want it to be able to walk 5 spaces in any direction.
Max_X = 2313 + 5 = 2318
Max_Y = 3227 + 5 = 3232
Min_X = 2313 - 5 = 2308
Min_Y = 3227 - 5 = 3222

So we would have:
spawn = 2313 3227 2397 0 2318 3232 2308 3222 1

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's walk

item.title: How do i make npc's walk
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

so what do i exaclty put just give me a random code for walking[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:357670”]Unless I’m mistaken,
spawn = 2313 3227 2397 0 Max_X Max_Y Min_X Min_Y 1[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's walk

item.title: How do i make npc's walk
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Fourth integer is the height, ninth integer is the walking type.

Read full topic
